articles.author: Liam Grace
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand lauds Man Utd star Bruno Fernandes and mocks Unai Emery - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: 'Have a reality check and know your place!'
articles.content:
Rio Ferdinand has told Aston Villa boss Unai Emery to sit back down (Picture: YouTube)
Rio Ferdinand has heaped praise on Bruno Fernandes and brutally mocked Aston Villa head coach Unai Emery after … [+1972 chars]
